comments.html: Yes, it is graphviz. One of the course attendees got better results by using link labels for interface names instead of record shapes. Maybe I'll rewrite my J2 template to try that one as well ;)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Looks like the diagram is being produced by graphviz; I would use it’s “neato” Force-directed layout instead of the standard layout for network diagrams as it produces good automatic layouts which usually don’t require any tweaks. http://www.graphviz.org/pdf/neatoguide.pdf
comments.name: RPM
